page.title: 16POCKET MONEY
page.content: Everybody in our class gets pocket money, the average amount being Â£1.20. The largest amount of money received is Â£5.00 and the least is 20p. Most people obtain the money at the weekend as this is the time when most people's parents collect their pay. Most of our class receive the money from their relatives. Some people had to work for their pocket money, but the majority didn't. Very few people had money knocked off for being badly behaved. Everybody in the class spends some of their pocket money. The most popular item was sweets, closely followed by books, comics and computer games. The average amount that people saved was Â£1.10. The least saved was 50p and the most was Â£10.00. This is because some parents gave children money that had to go in the bank and wasn't to be
